mapper.select: SELECT c.COMMENT_NUMBER , c.BOARD_NUMBER , c.CLUB_COMMENT_CONTENT , c.CLUB_COMMENT_DATE , c.CLUB_COMMENT_SECRET , c.CLUB_COMMENT_PARTNUMBER , c.CLUB_COMMENT_LEVEL , c.PROFILE_NICKNAME , p.member_ , p.PROFILE_IMG , p.PROFILE_IMG_PATH FROM CLUB_COMMENT c JOIN PROFILE p ON(c.profile_nickname = p.profile_nickname) JOIN MEMBER m ON(p.member_email = m.member_email) WHERE p.member_email = #{memberEmail};

SELECT c.COMMENT_NUMBER , c.BOARD_NUMBER , CLUB_COMMENT_CONTENT , CLUB_COMMENT_DATE , CLUB_COMMENT_SECRET , CLUB_COMMENT_PARTNUMBER , CLUB_COMMENT_LEVEL , c.PROFILE_NICKNAME , p.PROFILE_IMG , p.PROFILE_IMG_PATH FROM CLUB_COMMENT c JOIN PROFILE p ON(c.profile_nickname = p.profile_nickname) WHERE c.board_number = #{boardNumber};
